summary: This mod adds a clothing merchant to The Drunken Huntsman, in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]


This mod adds a clothing merchant to The Drunken Huntsman, in Whiterun.

I had been meaning to do this for a while and got around to it today, with the intention of making The Drunken Huntsman a bit livelier. Most people seem to prefer The Bannered Mare, but hey, there's more than just one tavern in Whiterun! And I like the idea of having more than just one clothing store in Skyrim, too.

As for now, the merchant tends to greet the player when entering instead of Elrindir, but I figure that's not much of a problem. I added a bedroom for her, and she'll sell her merchandise from around 8 AM to 20 PM.

An optional version also has children's clothing for sale, and requires Hearthfire.

I think that's about it. Have fun!

I originally made this mod for the Steam Workshop. Links [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=135397402]here (vanilla)[/url] and [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=137737042]here (Hearthfire)[/url]. To install, place the files in your 'SteamSteamAppsCommonSkyrimData' folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp.


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
